name: Mr. Giver
description: Mr. Giver ($GIVE) is a movement built around kindness, community, and giving back. Created by NK, a global creator with over 8 million followers, the project uses crypto as a force for good, funding real life acts of generosity, life changing surprises, animal rescues, and global giving events. Every holder becomes part of the mission to make giving viral, rewarding those who contribute to real impact through community challenges, creator rewards, and transparent storytelling. 100% of creator rewards go directly to helping people in need as NK aims to become the world’s #1 YouTuber focused entirely on changing lives. $GIVE isn’t just a token, it’s the world’s first kindness driven ecosystem built to transform lives through the power of community.
